mapper.sql: SELECT a.ContractID, a.ContractCode, a.ContractName, a.ContractType, a.ContractUserID , a.ContractTime, a.ProjectID, a.OrganizationID, a.ContractMoney, a.daxie , a.SupplierID, a.PayTotalTimes, a.PayedTimes, a.Reason, a.PassTime , a.SignConfirmTime, a.SignConfirmUserID, a.FirstPayTime, a.SheetStatus , t2.dict_label AS ContractTypeLinkText , t3.real_name AS ContractUserIDLinkText , t5.ProjectName AS ProjectIDLinkText, t6.dept_name AS OrganizationIDLinkText , t9.SupplierName AS SupplierIDLinkText, t13.dict_label AS SheetStatusLinkText FROM Aud_Contract a JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_type = '合同类型' ) t2 ON a.ContractType = t2.dict_value JOIN sys_user t3 ON a.ContractUserID = t3.user_id JOIN Aud_Project t5 ON a.ProjectID = t5.ProjectID JOIN sys_dept t6 ON a.OrganizationID = t6.dept_id JOIN SRM_SupplierInfo t9 ON a.SupplierID = t9.SupplierID JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_type = '单据状态' ) t13 ON a.SheetStatus = t13.dict_value
